org.apache.flink.runtime.operators.resettable

类 AbstractBlockResettableIterator<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.operators.resettable.AbstractBlockResettableIterator<T>
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    MemoryBlockIterator
    直接已知子类:
    BlockResettableMutableObjectIterator, NonReusingBlockResettableIterator

    abstract class AbstractBlockResettableIterator<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements MemoryBlockIterator
    Base class for iterators that fetch a block of data into main memory and offer resettable access to the data in that block.

      • open

      • nextBlock

        public boolean nextBlock()
                  throws java.io.IOException
        从接口复制的说明: MemoryBlockIterator
        Move the iterator to the next memory block. The next memory block starts at the first element that was not in the block before. A special case is when no record was in the block before, which happens when this function is invoked two times directly in a sequence, without calling hasNext() or next in between. Then the block moves one element.
        指定者:
        nextBlock 在接口中 MemoryBlockIterator
        返回:
        True if a new memory block was loaded, false if there were no further records and hence no further memory block.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown, when advancing to the next block failed.

      • close

        public void close()
        This method closes the iterator and releases all resources. This method works both as a regular shutdown and as a canceling method. The method may be called multiple times and will not produce an error.
